entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
